cause.description:
Music for All is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit educational organization based in Indianapolis, Indiana. Through its events and programs, Music for All provides quality avenues for learning and excellence through music education for the nation's high school students and teachers. Playing to a national audience, Music for All's mission is infused with a positive vision that touches lives forever.
Our passion is our mission, our mission is our cause, our cause is our name.
Help make music for all a reality.
You can donate to the cause, or directly to Music for All at http://www.musicforall.org/donate
Thank you for supporting Music for All!
1. Make music for all a reality.
cause.mission: Our mission is to create, provide and expand positively life-changing experiences through music for all.
cause.name: Music for All
